title: BRIEF-BASF India Ltd Gets Stay On Recovery Of Demand Notices
text:
BRIEF-BASF India Ltd Gets Stay On Recovery Of Demand Notices

Stock Markets 27 minutes ago (Oct 22, 2019 20:42)

© Reuters. BRIEF-BASF India Ltd Gets Stay On Recovery Of Demand Notices Oct 22 (Reuters) - BASF India Ltd : * BASF INDIA LTD SAYS STAY ON RECOVERY OF DEMAND NOTICES RECEIVED FROM COMMERCIAL TAX DEPARTMENT, KARNATAKA. * BASF INDIA LTD -KARNATAKA APPELLATE TRIBUNAL GRANTED STAY ON RECOVERY OF DEMAND AGGREGATING TO 2.26 BILLION RUPEES PERTAINING TO PERIOD 2006-2010

BRIEF-BASF India Ltd Gets Stay On Recovery Of Demand Notices
description: BRIEF-BASF India Ltd Gets Stay On Recovery Of Demand Notices
